Peripheral.Name: Embedded Flash
Peripheral.Description: The Flash memory interface manages CPU AHB I-Code and D-Code accesses to the Flash memory. It implements the erase and program Flash memory operations and the read and write protection mechanisms

Peripheral.Name: Data EEPROM
Peripheral.Description: The Data EEPROM memory block. It contains user data.

Peripheral.Name: OTP
Peripheral.Description: The Data OTP memory block. It contains the one time programmable bits.

Bit.Name: PRODUCT_STATE
Bit.Description: Life state code.

Bit.Name: PRODUCT_STATE
Bit.Description: Life state code.

Bit.Name: BOR_LEV
Bit.Description: Brownout level option status bit.

Values.Val: BOR OFF, POR/PDR reset threshold level is applied
BOR Level 1, the threshold level is low (around 2.1 V)
BOR Level 2, the threshold level is medium (around 2.4 V)
BOR Level 3, the threshold level is high (around 2.7 V)

Bit.Name: BOR_LEV
Bit.Description: Brownout level option status bit.

Values.Val: BOR OFF, POR/PDR reset threshold level is applied
BOR Level 1, the threshold level is low (around 2.1 V)
BOR Level 2, the threshold level is medium (around 2.4 V)
BOR Level 3, the threshold level is high (around 2.7 V)

Bit.Name: VDDIO_HSLV
Bit.Description: VDD I/O high-speed at low-voltage status bit.
Bit.Val: Product working in the full voltage range, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage disabled
VDD I/O below 2.5 V, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage feature allowed

Bit.Name: VDDIO_HSLV
Bit.Description: VDD I/O high-speed at low-voltage status bit.
Bit.Val: Product working in the full voltage range, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage disabled
VDD I/O below 2.5 V, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage feature allowed

Bit.Name: IWDG_STOP
Bit.Description: Stop mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system Stop mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system Stop mode.

Bit.Name: IWDG_STOP
Bit.Description: Stop mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system Stop mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system Stop mode.

Bit.Name: BOOT_UBE
Bit.Description: Unique boot entry control, selects either ST or OEM iRoT for secure boot.
Bit.Val: OEM-iRoT (system flash) selected
ST-iRoT (user flash) selected

Bit.Name: BOOT_UBE
Bit.Description: Unique boot entry control, selects either ST or OEM iRoT for secure boot.
Bit.Val: OEM-iRoT (system flash) selected
ST-iRoT (user flash) selected

Bit.Name: SWAP_BANK
Bit.Description: Bank swapping option status bit.
Bit.Val: bank 1 and bank 2 not swapped
bank 1 and bank 2 swapped

Bit.Description: Bank swapping option status bit.
Bit.Val: bank 1 and bank 2 not swapped
bank 1 and bank 2 swapped

Bit.Description: Core domain Shutdown entry reset option status bit.
Bit.Val: IWDG watchdog is controlled by hardware

Bit.Name: NRST_STOP
Bit.Description: Core domain DStop entry reset option status bit.
Bit.Val: a reset is generated when entering DStop or DStop2 mode on core domain
no reset generated when entering DStop or DStop2 mode on core domain

Bit.Description: Core domain DStop entry reset option status bit.

Bit.Name: NRST_STDY
Bit.Description: Core domain Standby entry reset option status bit.

no reset generated when entering Standby mode on core domain

Bit.Description: Core domain Standby entry reset option status bit.

Bit.Name: USB_EN
Bit.Description: USB peripheral enable bit

Bit.Name: HASH_EN
Bit.Description: HASH SHA IP enable bit.

Bit.Name: RNG_EN
Bit.Description: random number generator IP enable bit

Bit.Name: PKA_EN
Bit.Description: public key cryptography IP enable bit

Bit.Name: GFX_EN
Bit.Description: GFX module option status bit

Bit.Name: OTFDEC_EN
Bit.Description: OTFDEC option status bit. Controls on the fly decryption of external memory

Bit.Name: SAES_EN
Bit.Description: Secure AES module control bit. SAES is symmetric cryptography module with close ties to OBKey storage

Bit.Description: CAN module control bit

Bit.Name: BOOT_ADDR_NS
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Secure Address

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_NS
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings

Bit.Name: BOOT_ADDR_NS
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Secure Address

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_NS
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_SEC
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings.

Values.Val: The BOOT_UBE, SWAP and BOOT_ADDR_SEC can still be modified following their individual rules.
The BOOT_UBE and BOOT_ADDR_SEC are frozen. SWAP can only be modified with TZEN set to 0xC3 (disabled).

Bit.Name: BOOT_ADDR_SEC
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Secure Adress

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_SEC
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings.

Values.Val: The BOOT_UBE, SWAP and BOOT_ADDR_SEC can still be modified following their individual rules.
The BOOT_UBE and BOOT_ADDR_SEC are frozen. SWAP can only be modified with TZEN set to 0xC3 (disabled).

no reset generated when entering DStop or DStop2 mode on core domain

Bit.Name: NRST_STOP
Bit.Description: Core domain DStop entry reset option status bit.
Bit.Val: a reset is generated when entering DStop or DStop2 mode on core domain
no reset generated when entering DStop or DStop2 mode on core domain

Bit.Name: NRST_STDY
Bit.Description: Core domain Standby entry reset option status bit.
Bit.Val: a reset is generated when entering Standby mode on core domain
no reset generated when entering Standby mode on core domain

Bit.Name: NRST_STDY
Bit.Description: Core domain Standby entry reset option status bit.
Bit.Val: a reset is generated when entering Standby mode on core domain
no reset generated when entering Standby mode on core domain

The key is treated as PUF

Bit.Name: BOOT_ADDR_NS
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Secure Address

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_NS
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings

Bit.Name: BOOT_ADDR_NS
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Secure Address

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_NS
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_SEC
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings.

Values.Val: The BOOT_UBE, SWAP and BOOT_ADDR_SEC can still be modified following their individual rules.
The BOOT_UBE and BOOT_ADDR_SEC are frozen. SWAP can only be modified with TZEN set to 0xC3 (disabled).

Bit.Name: BOOT_ADDR_SEC
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Secure Adress

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK_SEC
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of UBE, SWAP, and BOOT_ADDR_SEC settings.

Values.Val: The BOOT_UBE, SWAP and BOOT_ADDR_SEC can still be modified following their individual rules.
The BOOT_UBE and BOOT_ADDR_SEC are frozen. SWAP can only be modified with TZEN set to 0xC3 (disabled).

Bit.Name: BOOT_ADDR_SEC
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Secure Adress.

Bit.Description: Life state code.

Bit.Name: BOR_LEV
Bit.Description: Brownout level option status bit.

Values.Val: BOR OFF, POR/PDR reset threshold level is applied
BOR Level 1, the threshold level is low (around 2.1 V)
BOR Level 2, the threshold level is medium (around 2.4 V)
BOR Level 3, the threshold level is high (around 2.7 V)

Bit.Name: BOR_LEV
Bit.Description: Brownout level option status bit.

Values.Val: BOR OFF, POR/PDR reset threshold level is applied
BOR Level 1, the threshold level is low (around 2.1 V)
BOR Level 2, the threshold level is medium (around 2.4 V)
BOR Level 3, the threshold level is high (around 2.7 V)

Bit.Name: VDDIO_HSLV
Bit.Description: VDD I/O high-speed at low-voltage status bit.
Bit.Val: Product working in the full voltage range, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage disabled
VDD I/O below 2.5 V, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage feature allowed

Bit.Name: VDDIO_HSLV
Bit.Description: VDD I/O high-speed at low-voltage status bit.
Bit.Val: Product working in the full voltage range, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage disabled
VDD I/O below 2.5 V, I/O speed optimization at low-voltage feature allowed

Bit.Name: IWDG_STOP
Bit.Description: Stop mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system Stop mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system Stop mode.

Bit.Name: IWDG_STOP
Bit.Description: Stop mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system Stop mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system Stop mode.

Bit.Name: BOOT_UBE
Bit.Description: Unique boot entry control, selects either ST or OEM iRoT for secure boot.
Bit.Val: OEM-iRoT (system flash) selected
ST-iRoT (user flash) selected

Bit.Name: BOOT_UBE

bank 1 and bank 2 swapped
